title: Chicken chasseur
description: A hearty chicken stew that's perfect after a bracing autumn walk. Serve with mountains of mash.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
small handful fresh tarragon, half left as sprigs, half finely chopped
2 tbsp fresh flatleaf parsley, finely chopped
1kg/2lb 2oz floury potatoes (such as King Edwards or Desiree), peeled, cut into chunks
salt and freshly ground black pepper
